sequence:
Taihou, Body and Soul

<size=45>Chapter 5: A Mighty(?) Clash</size>

scripts.say: I was out patrolling the base with my secretary ship Taihou.
Oh, hello, Akagi, Kaga.
Hm. Taihou. Making the rounds with the Commander? How diligent.
Commaaaanderrr~ And Taihou? Tch.
Aha! Ahahaha! Ahahahahahaaa! I look away for how long, and the Commander's already covered in pesky little vermin?
Looks like it's time for yet another round of "pest control."
Crimson flames started to lick upward from Akagi's body... Until,
(Smush)... I felt an incredible softness enveloping my arm. It was Taihou?
Isn't it a shame, Akagi, that it's me, Taihou, at my Commander's side? Hmm?
Oh but don't you worry. I'm doing a fine job in your place, Akagi. I've checked every inch of my Commander's body for "vermin." I've licked clean every~ nook~ and~ cranny~
Why you little... You're the one who copied the Commander's key! It's you who's been sneaking into that room every night to do heaven knows what...
Hehehe. Wasn't it you who threatened Akashi into letting you replace all my Commander's lunches with your own "special ingredients"?
The tension between the two of them was palpable, and Taihou's grip on my arm was getting tighter and tighter. I had completely lost my forearm to the softness.
Ummm, Commander...?
At least Kaga was looking out for me.
Ahahahaa! To get to walk like this arm in arm with my Commander...
I am truly the happiest girl alive!
She certainly seemed jovial.
To serve as your secretary, to give you the freedom to do whatever you want,
I'm sure this is the way to earn our just rewards, for you and I both, my Commander.
And that's how we ensure something like what happened back then, that will never happen again...
It turned out this secretary ship job had a very special meaning for Taihou.
